import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef, Fragment } from "react"; import emailjs from "@emailjs/browser"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; export default function HireMe() { // Contact Form const navigate = useNavigate(); const form = useRef(); const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs .sendForm( "service_pwvmojf", "template_ygg6k2c", form.current, "user_qGuGQyWW4uKSaHcStVUxO" ) .then( (result) => { console.log(result.text); }, (error) => { console.log(error.text); } ); e.target.reset(); navigate("/thank-you"); }; // Footer copyright const [date, setDate] = useState(); const getYear = () => setDate(new Date().getFullYear()); useEffect(() => { getYear(); }, []); return ( <>
